text: - [Narrator] Cars are getting smarter.

And today, automakers source
their smart components
from multiple suppliers,

each using their own
language to map data signals.

This has led to data
fragmentation and silos,

making it almost impossible
to create insights

across fleets of different
vehicles, models, and brands.

AWS IoT FleetWise helps
enable data interoperability
across vehicle models and components.

It's vehicle modeling feature
and global signal catalog

allow suppliers to map out
their components' data signals
in the same language,
which makes it easier to work together

and allows for universal
data interpretation,
while still protecting

each supplier's proprietary
technologies and data.
Gain unified insights

across components, makes,
models, and fleets,
and help create safer, smarter vehicles
with AWS IoT FleetWise.
